purpose: Curate and organize a comprehensive list of the best tools and resources for managing LLMOps (Large Language Model Operations).
principle: Aggregates community-contributed tools and resources focused on LLMOps into a structured and accessible format.
reusability: Can be used as a reference by developers and researchers looking for tools and resources related to LLMOps. Contributions are open for community submissions.
limitations: Depends on community contributions for updates and completeness; may not cover all available LLMOps tools.
name: Awesome-LLMOps

highlight: Comprehensive and community-curated list of LLMOps tools, providing a centralized resource for developers and researchers.
